extendedInfo.description: Lynette's conniving husband has cheated her out of her family business! What can an enterprising young woman like her do? Get revenge! Use your business savvy to help Lynette repurchase her company and send her husband to the slammer. Buy, develop and sell commercial properties to make a profit; build attractions that increase your income; and keep your eye on the bottom line as you purchase materials and hire workers. The point-and-tap fun of Hotel Mogul will have you laughing all the way to the bank!LITE VERSION INCLUDES:â Two exotic settings (of five available in the full version)â 10 levels (of 35)â One mini-game (of four)â Three kinds of hotels (of six)â Vibrant graphics and sound!--------More fun games from Alawar:â GOURMANIA â Become the world's top chef in this addictive hidden object smash hit!â SUNSHINE ACRES - Don't pass up your chance to farm one of the most beautiful places on Earth!--------FIND US: www.facebook.com/AlawarEntertainmentFOLLOW US: www.twitter.com/alawargamesBe the first to hear about our new games and awesome contests!

reviews.comment: One of the most well done and entertaining games I\'v found on the market. Defenatly worth buying. Kinda wish there was a ad supported version, Hero

reviews.comment: Using samsyng galaxy s. works perfectly fine and really fun. Will buy the full version. Developer, can we hv monopoly games too???

reviews.title: Amazing!!!!
reviews.comment: This game is a great substitute for the game build a lot 2 on the apple store. It is easy to play and it sucks you in big time especially when you are trying to beat the expert time.  Highly recommended!!!
